H0.text: deep water fishing boat with many baited hooks. Trawler

H1.text: deep water fishing boat with many baited hooks. Drifter

H2.text: deep water fishing boat with many baited hooks. Seiner

H3.text: deep water fishing boat with many baited hooks. Longline

A4.text: Hundreds or even thousands of baited hooks can hang from a single line.

A5.text: Longline fishing, or longlining, is a commercial fishing angling technique that uses a long main line with baited hooks attached at intervals via short branch lines called snoods or gangions.
